content.text: Match ends, Villarreal 1, Recreativo 1.
Second Half ends, Villarreal 1, Recreativo 1.
Foul by Cani (Villarreal).
Dimas (Recreativo) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Cani (Villarreal) left footed shot from the right side of the six yard box misses to the right. Assisted by Juanma Gómez with a cross.
Foul by Chuli (Recreativo).
Jaume Costa (Villarreal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Ikechukwu Uche (Villarreal) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Mateo Musacchio.
Offside, Recreativo. Diego Riolfo tries a through ball, but Jordi Matamala is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Diego Riolfo (Recreativo) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Goal!  Villarreal 1, Recreativo 1. Gerard Moreno (Villarreal) header from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Juanma Gómez with a cross.
Corner,  Recreativo. Conceded by Juan Carlos Sánchez.
